upgrades.changelog:
Includes firmware versions: 1.0, 1.01, 1.03, 1.04, 1.10, 1.20, 1.30, 1.40, 1.50, 2.00, 2.10.
* Based on Z-Wave SDK version 7.23.2 (read full release notes from Silicon Labs here)
* Added LED indicator feature: Solid Red when powered ON and blinking Red when receiving commands.

Includes firmware versions: 1.0, 1.01, 1.03, 1.04, 1.10, 1.20, 1.30, 1.40, 1.50, 2.00, 2.10.
* Based on Z-Wave SDK version 7.23.2 (read full release notes from Silicon Labs here)
* Added LED indicator feature: Solid Red when powered ON and blinking Red when receiving commands.
* Added Z-Wave Long Range support for Europe
